attributes.action: comment on the situation where he has been petitioned by 72,233 members of the population of this country for him to resign, which is 72,233 more than those who voted for him to be in office, so it is right for him to go now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
